articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Phonekham Inthaboualy handed the floral basket over to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: U.S. Government Decides to Offer Humanitarian Aid to DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Government Decides to Offer Humanitarian Aid to DPRK
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The government of the United States of America decided to offer humanitarian aid to the DPRK in connection with the flood which hit the northern part of the country last year.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to New Somali President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to New Somali President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Feb. 10 sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed upon his election as Somali president.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in line with the common interests and desire of the two peoples, the message wished the Somali president great success in his work for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by common efforts, wishing the president and people of Iran greater success in their work for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving the nation's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian FM
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Friday sent a message of greeting to Mohammad Javad Zarif, foreign minister of Iran, on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger thanks to the positive cooperation and efforts between the foreign ministries of the two countries and wished him greater success in his work.

articles.title: Reception Given by Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the day of diplomatic officials of Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and other officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Russian embassy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Prize Awarded to Kim Myong Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Prize Awarded to Kim Myong Un
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Prize was awarded to Kim Myong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Kim Myong Un successfully produced art works depicting the images of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and  other masterpieces of cognitional and educational value by thoroughly embodying the Party' idea of Juche-oriented literature and art. They have made a great contribution to educating the Party members and other working people in their greatness.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Jan. 25.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Meritorious Officials
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Meritorious Officials
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was conferred on Rim Jong Hwan, Choe Yong Dok, Ri Yun Gil and Ho Song Gil on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They energetically organized and mobilized masses for the drive for carrying out the behests of the leaders and upholding the Party's policies through skillful organizational and political work and exemplary deeds, cherishing intense loyalty to the Party and the leaders and a high sense of responsibility for the revolutionary duties and thus made great contributions to building a socialist power. 
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK promulgated a decree in this regard on January 25.

articles.title: Honor Prizes Awarded to Youth and Children
articles.content:
Honor Prizes Awarded to Youth and Children
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize were awarded to the exemplary primary committees, officials and members of the youth league and members of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize went to 17 primary committees of the youth league, 27 officials and members of the youth league and Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize to 107 members of the KCU.
					
					 An awarding ceremony was held at the Youth League Hall Friday.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of officials and members of the women's union at the Hall of Women on Friday to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the meeting were Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, and its officials and members.
					
					 Jin Yong Hwa who is widow of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Paek Hak Rim said that her husband glorified his valuable life as an orderly in the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle in Mt Paektu and commanding officer of the revolutionary armed forces till the last moments of his life under the particular loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Sun Hwa, official of the Ministry of Culture, noted that Kim Jong Il trained her father-in-law Sin Yun Son as documentary cameraman and reposed deep trust in him.
					
					 Kim Hyo Suk who is daughter of Jong Chun Sil, former director of the Jonchon County Commercial Agency, said that she could never forget the loving care of Kim Jong Il who visited an ordinary shop in the mountain county several times, clarifying issues arising in commercial service and leading her mother to creditably perform her duty as a servant of the people.
					
					 The speakers stressed that the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il are shining more brilliantly under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ice Sculpture Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
Ice Sculpture Festival in DPRK
Samjiyon, February 10 (KCNA) -- The ice sculpture festival "We'll Travel One Road Forever" is now under way with splendor in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display are more than 1 200 ice sculptures of 75 varieties created by shock brigade members of the regiment of the Ministry of People's Security of the Construction Brigade 618 of Division 216.  
					
					 Spectacular scenery is presented by peculiar and diverse ice sculptures dealing with the tremendous national power of the DPRK and the reality of the DPRK which is turning into a land of bliss.
					
					 The festival is drawing an endless stream of members of the shock brigade of the division, those of the group for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, officials and working people in Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Exhibitions Open
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Exhibitions Open
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Korean stamp exhibitions were opened at the venue of the exhibition of Korean stamps and the Korean Stamps Museum on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions are photos dealing with stamps showing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display are stamps of different themes showing the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the great man.
					
					 The exhibitions will remain open till February 20.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- New stamps (four sheets) reflecting the gist of the New Year Address for Juche 106 (2017) made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were issued in the DPRK.
					 One of them stresses that the single-hearted unity and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development are a precious truth of the Juche revolution proved through the struggle in 2016. Seen in its upper part are letters "2016, a year of revolutionary event, a year of great change, worthy of note in the history of our Party and country". It also carries letters and pictures showing the brilliant achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea last year.
					
					 The atom-shaped sheet with a slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" carries a stamp calling on the electric-power, metallurgical and chemical industries to take the lead and pictures representing the tasks for respective sectors to concentrate efforts on implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 Another sheet reflects an idea of the New Year Address to designate this year of the 85th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA) as another year of training, another year of perfecting its combat preparedness and raise the fierce flames of increasing the military capability to train all officers and men of the KPA as a-match-for-a-hundred combatants, tigers of Mt Paektu, with letters "Let us further cement the political and military position of socialism as an impregnable fortress".
					
					 Printed in the upper part of the other sheet are letters "Let us set up across the Party a revolutionary climate of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people" with the gist of a swear made by the respected Supreme Leader to become a true servant loyal to the people and a stamp calling on officials to seek more tasks for the sake of the people.

articles.title: Sweet Rice Dish, National Food with Pharmacological Action
articles.content:
Sweet Rice Dish, National Food with Pharmacological Action
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The January 15th of the lunar calendar falls on February 11 this year.
					 The Korean people have enjoyed the day, taking various national dishes.
					
					 One of them is Yakbab (sweet rice dish) with high nutritive value and good pharmacological action.
					
					 Yakbab, made with glutinous rice, chestnut, date, honey, pine nuts, walnut and others, is known effective for refreshment and efficacious for different diseases like arteriosclerosis, scurvy, purpura and stomach troubles.
					
					 Now, the dish is greatly popular among people, thanks to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to protect national heritage.

articles.title: Jangsan Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Jangsan Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting the Jangsan Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 There are in the site historic relics showing the fact that Kim Jong Il participated in the project for expanding Wasandong-Ryongsong motorway during his revolutionary activities at Kim Il Sung University and historic relics showing the fact that he planted trees on Mt Jang and guided military training of students of Pyongyang Namsan Senior Middle School (at that time) and the university.
					
					The site has been visited by at least 7,100,000 service personnel of the People's Army and people from all walks of life and school youth and children over the past four decades since its opening.
					
					 It has been visited by service personnel and working people from over 200 units and school youth and children this year.

articles.title: Famous Magician's Family
articles.content:
Famous Magician's Family
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, there are many families whose members are engaged in same occupations like military service and sports from generation to generation.
					 One of them is a magician's family well-known across the country.
					
					 The master of the family is Labor Hero Kim Thaek Song, a Kim Il Sung Prize winner and People's Artiste who is working as the head of jugglery department of Pyongyang Acrobatic School. He has two magician sons, Kim Chol and Kim Kwang Chol who are also Kim Il Sung Prize winners and People's Artistes, and grandson Kim Kwang Song who is a student of the training class at Pyongyang Acrobatic School.
					
					 Kim Thaek Song had enjoyed world-wide fame in the 1970s and the 1980s after taking the first place at the 9th International Modern Magic Festival in Juche 61 (1972). From that time, he had won the every International Modern Magic Festival and was awarded the title of magic king in 1981 and 1985. At the age of 67, he started his career as a teacher to train reserve magicians.
					
					 Kim Chol, head of the jugglery section of the National Acrobatic Troupe, won the top place for three times at different international magic festivals, including the 19th International Modern Magic Festival in July 1984, and a best prize of technique in 1996. Typical of his products are illusionary juggleries "Girls Reflected in Mirror" and "Warriors".
					
					 Director Kim Kwang Chol took the first prize and Grand Prix at the International Magic Festival in 1985 and the first prize and the best prize of technique in 1987 and 1989 respectively.

articles.title: Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for National Reunification Will Shine Long: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for National Reunification Will Shine Long: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il ushered in the era of independent reunification through the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and provided a firm foundation for the victory of the cause of national reunification through the adoption of the October 4 declaration. These patriotic feats will always go down in the history of the country. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It was the firm faith of Kim Jong Il that the reunification of the country should be achieved independently by the concerted efforts of all Koreans responsible for it.
					
					 He met every challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad by dint of the ever-victorious Songun politics, providing a favorable environment for the country's reunification and ushering in a heyday of the nation-wide reunification movement.
					
					 Representing the requirements of the era for putting the inter-Korean relations rapidly developing with the advance of the era of independent reunification on a new stage of progress and the desire of the Koreans for peace and prosperity, he made sure that another round of the north-south summit was held in October, Juche 96 (2007) and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted.
					
					 By providing the October 4 declaration with his outstanding leadership Kim Jong Il enabled the Korean nation to more dynamically spur the advance of the June 15 era of reunification with a clear milestone for the development of north-south relations, peace and prosperity.
					
					 After the publication of the October 4 declaration, contact and dialogue made more brisk headway in various fields of politics, economy and military, including the north-south prime ministers talks, and joint promotion organizations were formed between the north and the south.
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration prompted the Koreans to express profound reverence for Kim Jong Il who made indefatigable efforts for the unity of the north and the south and the independent reunification, more ardently loving the country and the nation than anyone else.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should thoroughly preserve and implement the above-said declarations, invariably upholding them, and thus achieve the independent reunification of the country as early as possible.

articles.title: Conquering Outer Space Is Path of Revolution, Independence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Conquering Outer Space Is Path of Revolution, Independence: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's development of outer space is accompanied by struggle due to the U.S. and other hostile forces who slap sanctions against the DPRK, taking issue with its satellite launch only, says Rodong Sinmun on Friday in an article.
					 The DPRK's project for conquering outer space is the road of the revolution.
					
					 The DPRK's project for space development started amid the hostile forces' military pressure and economic blockade.
					
					 When the DPRK successfully launched its earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 last year, the U.S. and its vassal forces fabricated "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council as they did in the past.
					
					 Not a few countries expressed concern that the DPRK would face adverse consequences if it did not comply with the U.S. demand for halting the satellite launch and some countries were displeased with the launch.
					
					 No matter how persistently the hostile forces may deny the DPRK's status as a satellite manufacturer and launcher, its status can never change and it can never abandon its project because of anyone's opposition.
					
					 Neither threat nor pressure could shake the DPRK's will and resolution.
					
					 The DPRK's road of conquering outer space was by no means a smooth sailing but it has steadfastly covered the road.
					
					 The DPRK's conquering outer space is also the road of independence.
					
					 It has developed outer space, staking the dignity and self-esteem of the nation on it as this is the path chosen by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people.
					
					 With no frenzy can the U.S. and its vassal forces ever block the DPRK from conquering outer space.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Authorities' Unreasonable Court Decision against Chongryon
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Authorities' Unreasonable Court Decision against Chongryon
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Osaka District Court of Japan recently made a decision of dismissing the suit filed by the Osaka Korean School, one of the institutions for national education of Koreans in Japan, in September 2012 to defend the Koreans' right to democratic national education.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 This is an unreasonable decision gravely threatening the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan and a serious politically-motivated provocation to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 It is, at the same time, part of the base repressive moves of the Japanese authorities to defile the future of Koreans in Japan and incite the anti-Chongryon sentiments throughout the Japanese society.
					
					 Lurking behind the persistent sordid moves of the Japanese authorities and right-wing reactionaries against Chongryon is their sinister design to stifle the democratic national education of Koreans and suppress and stamp out Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards it.
					
					 Koreans in Japan are just like our brothers and sisters and members of the great family in the socialist homeland.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate the political suppression and vicious persecution by the Japanese reactionaries against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan but resolutely counter them.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should retract the decision at once, aware of the fact that their persecution and suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan would only harden the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to retaliate against them and they will have to pay dearly for those actions.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Participate in U.S.-led Nuclear War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Participate in U.S.-led Nuclear War Drill
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet air force plans to participate in nuclear war maneuvers led by the U.S. strategic command under the pretext of coping with "space threat", according to south Korean media on Wednesday.
					 Some days ago, a senior official of the command flew to south Korea and held a confab on using space as nuclear war theatre.
					
					 The puppet warmongers are going to send an officer to the command and participate in the nuclear war drill to be waged by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in the latter half of the year.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Hwang Kyo An's Talk about "Threat from North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Hwang Kyo An's Talk about "Threat from North"
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Wednesday in an editorial dismissed acting "president" Hwang Kyo An's trumpeting about provocation by the north.
					 The editorial accused Hwang of asserting that "there is increasing likelihood of provocation by the north this month" at a "state council meeting" on Tuesday.
					
					 It stressed that he should clearly know that such groundless "talk about threat from the north" is little short of doing harm to south Korea and to himself.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmakers Denounce Hwang Kyo An for Dreaming of "Presidency"
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmakers Denounce Hwang Kyo An for Dreaming of "Presidency"
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers of the Minju Party of south Korea on February 3 denounced puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An for dreaming of "presidency" though he is the core element involved in the power abusing scandal.
					 They demanded Hwang clarify his stand not to run for the "presidency" as urged by the will of the participants in the candlelight rallies.
					
					 They demanded Hwang promptly approve the search inside Chongwadae.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Marked in Algeria
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Marked in Algeria
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- An Algerian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the General Youth Union of Algeria on Feb. 1.
					 The chairperson of the union was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, film show and photo exhibition to praise the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the period from Feb. 1 to April 15.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed at the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" of Russia on Jan. 30.
					 Donets, chairman of the branch, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Uganda
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed at the building of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement on Jan. 30.
					 Henri Masico, general political commissar of the Uganda People's Defense Forces and director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including seminar, lecture and photo exhibition on the anniversary.

articles.title: Seminars on Feats of Kim Jong Il Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Feats of Kim Jong Il Held in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's feats were held in Kuwait, Bangladesh, Indonesia and Germany between Jan. 19 and 27 to mark his birth anniversary.
					 Attending them were personages of different social standings and masses of those countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star noted that leader Kim Jong Il defended the world peace and justice and glorified the era of independence, frustrating the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The powerful DPRK today is inseparable from his leadership, the chairman said, adding that he turned the DPRK into a great country with his matchless pluck.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star and other speakers said that the Korean people have absolutely trusted the leader, possessed of warm love for the people and belief in them, as children follow their mother. And they praised him for having cemented the single-mined unity of the whole society that no statesmen of any other country could achieve.
					
					 The chairman and members of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the country and the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, was brought out in booklet at the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia on Jan. 26.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a history of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also stresses that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be invincible.

articles.title: Russians Urge Western Countries to Learn about DPRK's Reality
articles.content:
Russians Urge Western Countries to Learn about DPRK's Reality
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Russian personages on Jan. 20 and Feb. 1 exposed injustice of the anti-DPRK human rights smear campaign conducted by the U.S. and its followers.
					 Disclosing the illegality of anti-DPRK "human rights resolutions" cooked up at the UN, Konstantin Asmolov, a senior researcher of the Center for Research on Korea at the Institute of the Far East under the Russian Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 It was of insignificance to discuss about "human rights issue" of north Korea.
					
					 The so-called "human rights report" is based on lies quite different to the reality of north Korea.
					
					 "Defectors from the north" and those who were involved in cooking up the "report" said that the contents themselves were based on lies.
					
					 The academic secretary of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Far Eastern Region said that the U.S. and other Western countries, which were talkative over the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK, are now getting vocal about the non-existent "human rights issue" of the country.
					
					 The academic secretary went on:
					
					 The so-called "human rights report," cooked up by the U.S. and other Western countries, is nothing but an invalid document which is not worthy of any discussion.
					
					 It is important for the U.S. and other Western countries to learn about the reality of the DPRK before talking about its "human rights issue".
					
					 The people of the DPRK are enjoying all social benefits.
					
					 There are no unemployed in the country.
					
					 The Korean people are regarding it as their inviolable duty to defend the socialist system.

articles.title: Gobierno norteamericano ofrece asistencia humanitaria a RPDC
articles.content:
Gobierno norteamericano ofrece asistencia humanitaria a RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- El gobierno de los Estados Unidos decidio ofrecer la asistencia humanitaria a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en relacion con que la region septentrional de este pais asiatico fue danada por las inundaciones en el ano pasado.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Somalia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Somalia
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 10 un mensaje de felicitacion a Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed, electo como presidente de la Republica Federal de Somalia.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran de acuerdo con los intereses y deseos comunes de los pueblos de dos paises y formulo votos por mayores exitos en el trabajo del destinatario por la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el 38o aniversario de triunfo de revolucion islamica de Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el 38o aniversario de triunfo de revolucion islamica de Iran
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 10 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, Hassan Rouhani, con motivo del 38o aniversario del triunfo de la revolucion islamica de Iran. 
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las tareas del mandatario y el pueblo irani para defender la soberania del pais y lograr el desarrollo y prosperidad de la nacion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el Festival de Esculturas de Hielo por el Dia de la Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el Festival de Esculturas de Hielo por el Dia de la Estrella Luz
Samjiyon, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tiene lugar en el distrito de Samjiyon de la provincia de Ryanggang el Festival de Esculturas de Hielo "Iremos siempre por nuestro camino". 
					Se exhibieron mas de mil 200 esculturas de 75 tipos creadas por los miembros de la brigada de choque del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo perteneciente a la Brigada de Construccion 618 de la Division 216. 
					
					Forman un mundo maravilloso reflejando el inagotable poderio y la realidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que se convierte en el paraiso del pueblo. 
					
					Visitan sin parar la sede del festival los miembros de la Division 216, los integrantes de los grupos de recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu y los funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia veredicto injusto de autoridades japonesas
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia veredicto injusto de autoridades japonesas
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el tribunal local de Osaka de Japon denego el pleito presentado en septiembre de 2012 por la Escuela Coreana de Osaka, uno de los organos de la educacion nacional de los coreanos residentes en el pais isla, para defender el derecho a la educacion nacional democratica de los coreanos en Japon. 
					En un comentario individual insertado el dia 10, el periodico Minju Joson lo califica de una sentencia injusta contra los derechos nacionales democraticos de los coreanos y de una provocacion politica anti-Chongryon, y prosigue:
					
					El presente pleito es una prolongacion de la vil campana represiva destinada a pisotear el futuro de la sociedad de los compatriotas e inculcar en la sociedad japonesa el ambiente anti-Chongryon.
					
					Las persistentes tentativas anti-Chongryon de las autoridades japonesas y los reaccionarios derechistas persiguen la meta de acabar con la educacion nacional democratica de los coreanos en su pais sumandose activamente a la politica hostil a la RPDC de su amo norteamericano y descomponer cueste lo que cueste la Chongryon, digna entidad de ciudadanos ultramarinos de la RPDC.
					
					La Chongryon es una prestigiosa organizacion de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y estos son hermanos consanguineos que comparten el mismo destino con la patria socialista. 
					
					La RPDC no estara con brazos cruzados ante la perversa presion politica de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon y sus integrantes y tomara contramedidas pertinentes. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben parar ahora mismo la represion contra la Chongryon y los coreanos en su pais al darse cuenta de que tendran que pagar muy caro sus actos hostiles que redoblan el animo de venganza de los militares y habitantes de la RPDC.
